=xml-util=

This project contains a utilitary class that enables to serialize or deserialize any object with XML.
It relies on the the XStream API.

==Install the jar==

First, download the latest jar version by following this <a href="http://xstream.codehaus.org/download.html">link</a>.<br/>
Then, open a shell where the jar file is located and type this commande : <br/>
mvn install:install-file -DgroupId=xstream -DartifactId=xstream -Dversion=1.4.2 -Dpackaging=jar -DgeneratePom=true -Dfile="xstream-1.4.2.jar"
